member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.QR_TextBytes(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert a text string to qr-code in form of an byte array which can be printed to an ASCII-printer with codepage 437 or 850. If no character and line spacing is used a readable qr-code is printed

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.QR_TextChars(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert a text string to qr-code in form of an unicode-char array which can be printed to an printer. If no character and line spacing is used a readable qr-code is printed

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.AZTEC_TextBytes(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert a text string to aztec-code in form of an byte array which can be printed to an ASCII-printer with codepage 437 or 850. If no character and line spacing is used a readable aztec-code is printed

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.AZTEC_TextChars(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert a text string to aztec-code in form of an unicode-char array which can be printed to an printer. If no character and line spacing is used a readable aztec-code is printed

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.QR_Grafic(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a text string to qr-code in form of an byte array which contains a png-grafic.

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.QR_Grafic_Bmp(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a text string to qr-code in form of an byte array which contains a bmp-grafic.

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.QR_Grafic(System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a text string to qr-code in form of an byte array which contains a grafic.

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.AZTEC_Grafic(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a text string to aztec-code in form of an byte array which contains a png-grafic.

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.AZTEC_Grafic_Bmp(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a text string to aztec-code in form of an byte array which contains a bmp-grafic.

member.name: M:fiskaltrust.ifPOS.TwoDCode.AZTEC_Grafic(System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a text string to qr-code in form of an byte array which contains a grafic.
